p: Suggestive symptoms of CHIKV infection were reported by 51/168 (30%) of the patients in the group using bDMARDs and in 21/56 (37.5%) of the control group subjects ( p=0.397), but serology for anti-CHIKV IgG was positive in only 42/168 (25%) and in 15/56 (27%) for the cases and controls, respectively, without a statistically significant difference between the groups ( p=0.79).
